title: notocactus
author: notocactus
content: Hi,I want to find a good designer for a Telegram sticker set that can be either static or animated.Feel free to leave your portfolio & service announcement thread here for discussion.Thanks for your time.

comments.author: icopress
comments.body: Have you contacted Jayce? I think he is a master in everything that concerns design.

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: Quote from: icopress on May 09, 2022, 05:25:09 AMHave you contacted Jayce? I think he is a master in everything that concerns design.I know his great design skills and ordered him an announcement design in the past. I did not know he offers Telegram sticker design. Thanks for your reminder, let me check it again.

comments.author: payjoe93
comments.body: Yoo, here we go..https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5349892Contact me on telegram @payjoe93 if you interestingThanks

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: Quote from: payjoe93 on May 09, 2022, 03:07:11 PMYoo, here we go..https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5349892Contact me on telegram @payjoe93 if you interestingThanksThank you. I still need more application. Keep applying everyone.

comments.author: icalical
comments.body: Hi, I have created some animated sticker you can check herehttps://t.me/addstickers/kaso2kahttps://t.me/addstickers/lightyeargamehttps://t.me/addstickers/kommunitas01https://t.me/addstickers/hodlvaulthttps://t.me/addstickers/dopedogeyou can check my service thread here, https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3680041.0and if you are interested you can contact me through telegram https://t.me/taufikarbaithanks
